Class Dictionary

  • java.lang.Object
    • Dictionary

  • public class Dictionary
extends java.lang.Object
    All loaded Dictionaries are stored in this class. This class provides methods for manipulating dictionaries, such as loading and saving them, translating words etc.
    Author:
    group 1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dictionary()
      constructor for a new Dictionary object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dictionary

        public Dictionary()
        constructor for a new Dictionary object. Loads an en-de and de-en dictionary by default and adds supported directions to the dictionary Moreover it reads dictionary files and loads to hashmaps. Opens writers for every word (efficienty purposes)

    • Method Detail

      • initialiseDirection

        public void initialiseDirection(java.lang.String direction)
        Initialises a direction. This includes registering the direction in the direction index, creating a HashMap for translation, adding the path to the file where the dictionary is stored, creating a new file for that direction, if necessary. Moreover, all entries in the text file will be loaded into a hashmap. A writer is initialized as well
        Parameters:
        direction - the directing of the dictionary

      • loadDictionary

        public void loadDictionary(java.lang.String direction)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Given a direction, this function parses a dictionary from a file to HashMap of direction. If it already exists or it can't load it for whatever reason it throws an Exception
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction of the dictionary to load
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws an exception if the dictionary is already loaded
        java.lang.Exception

      • saveDictionary

        public void saveDictionary()
        this function saves all dictionaries to their corresponding files and replaces existing files

      • translate

        public java.lang.String translate(java.lang.String word,
                                  java.lang.String direction)
        translates a single word
        Parameters:
        word - the word to be translated
        direction - the direction of translation
        Returns:
        translation of that word

        public void removeFromDictionary(java.lang.String key,
                                 java.lang.String direction)
        removes key-value from dictionary
        Parameters:

        direction - the dictionary the key should be removed from
